title: Easy - Reverse Words
description: Write a function that takes a string of words and returns the same words, but with each word reversed. You may assume that the input will consist of only letters and spaces. Examples: `reverse_words('hello world')` should return `'dlrow olleh'` and `reverse_words('the quick brown fox')` should return `'eht kciuq nworb xof'`.
tests: assert reverse_words('the quick brown fox') == 'eht kciuq nworb xof'
